statements: UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET price = 2500.00, timestamp = '2022-01-25 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET timestamp = '2022-01-26 15:45:00', price = 2800.75 WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Bitcoin' AND exchange_name = 'Binance';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET price = 200.55 WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Bitcoin';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET exchange_name = 'Binance', timestamp = '2021-10-20 08:00:00' WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Ethereum';
UPDATE CryptocurrencyPrices SET price = 2500.50 WHERE exchange_id = 1 AND cryptocurrency_id = 2;
UPDATE Exchanges SET website = 'https://example.com', location = 'New York' WHERE exchange_id = 3;
UPDATE CryptocurrencyPrices SET price = 1500.75 WHERE exchange_id = 1 AND cryptocurrency_id = 2;
UPDATE Exchanges SET location='New York', exchange_name='Wall Street Exchange' WHERE exchange_id = 3;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET price = 150.75 WHERE exchange_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-10-15 10:30:00'
UPDATE investor_decisions SET amount = 500.00, action = 'SELL' WHERE decision_id = 3
UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET price = price + 100 WHERE exchange_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE investor_decisions SET amount = CASE WHEN action = 'BUY' THEN amount * 1.1 ELSE amount * 0.9 END WHERE decision_id = 5;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_exchange SET exchange_location = 'New York' WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance';
UPDATE price_data SET price = 1500.00, timestamp = '2022-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE cryptocurrency_id = 'xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx' AND exchange_id = 'yyyy-yyyy-yyyy-yyyy';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_exchange SET exchange_location = 'New York' WHERE exchange_name = 'Coinbase';
UPDATE price_data SET price = 5000.00 WHERE cryptocurrency_id = '7b5b30a5-39d3-4eeb-9c5a-730b6b81e61d';
UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET price = 35000.12 WHERE symbol = 'BTC';
UPDATE exchanges SET website_url = 'www.updatedexchange.com', exchange_name = 'Updated Exchange' WHERE exchange_id = 3;
UPDATE cryptocurrency_prices SET price = 25000.123, volume = 15000.987 WHERE exchange_id = 1 AND symbol = 'BTC';
UPDATE exchanges SET website_url = 'https://www.newwebsite.com', location = 'New York', exchange_name = 'New Exchange Name' WHERE exchange_id = 2;
